com.joffrey_bion.compression

Class BlockCompressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joffrey_bion.compression.BlockCompressor

  •  class BlockCompressor
extends java.lang.Object
    Part of the Compressor that uses only algorithms that work on blocks of data (especially not Huffman, that works on a whole file).
    Author:
    Joffrey Bion

    • Constructor Detail

      • BlockCompressor

        public BlockCompressor(java.lang.String sourceName,
               java.lang.String destName)
                throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new BlockCompressor for the given source and destination files.
        Parameters:
        sourceName - The relative path to the source file.
        destName - The relative path to the destination file. The file will be created if it does not exist, overwritten otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any problem occurs while reading or writing in the given files.

    • Method Detail

      • compress

        public void compress()
              throws java.io.IOException
        Compresses the source file block by block, writing each block in the destination file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any problem occurs while reading or writing in the given files.

      • uncompress

        public void uncompress()
                throws java.io.IOException
        Uncompresses the source file block by block, writing each block in the destination file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any problem occurs while reading or writing in the given files.
